metadata.title: CVE-2014-5253 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
OpenStack Identity (Keystone) 2014.1.x before 2014.1.2.1 and Juno beforeJuno-3 does not properly revoke tokens when a domain is invalidated, whichallows remote authenticated users to retain access via a domain-scopedtoken for that domain.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5253` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

keystone - 1:2014.1.2.1-0ubuntu1.1
python-keystone - 1:2014.1.2.1-0ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: keystone package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2014.1.2.1-0ubuntu1.1').
